==Shortcuts Keys==
 * {{{[F1]}}} Help.
 * {{{[F2]}}} Configuration window. 
 * {{{[F3]}}} Access to the loading screen. 
 * {{{[F4]}}} Access to the screen to save.
 * {{{[F5]}}} PSG registers Dump.
 * {{{[Return]}}} Play / Pause Song. 
 * {{{[Select]}}} Play / Pause Pattern.
 * {{{[Ins]}}} Play PSG registers simultaneously. 
 * {{{[Stop]}}} Stops playing the pattern. 
 * {{{[1]}}}, {{{[2]}}} and {{{[3]}}}. Channel Mute.
